structure.unit: ARTICLE CLVII. ATLANTIC VILLAS AT KENDALL MULTIPURPOSE MAINTENANCE SPECIAL TAXING DISTRICT

text.section: In accordance with the provisions of of the Code of Miami-Dade County, Florida, a special taxing district to be known and designated as the ATLANTIC VILLAS AT KENDALL MULTIPURPOSE MAINTENANCE SPECIAL TAXING DISTRICT is hereby created and established in the unincorporated area of Miami-Dade County, Florida.
